ffhs.controller

Class GameLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ffhs.controller.GameLayoutController

  • public class GameLayoutController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Controller for the game Layout It controls the user commands during a game.

      • buildPlayingField

        public void buildPlayingField(int amount,
                              int size,
                              PlayingField pf)
        creates the playing Field and generates all the Rectangle
        Parameters:
        amount - the size of the playing Field ( 8 for 8x8 or 10 for 10x10)
        size - the size of the playing Field in Pixel (primarystage.getHeight - 200) TODO : Better Formula for size
        pf - Object from PlayingField to read the Fields

      • moveToken

        public void moveToken(Move move)
        moves a token across the field. skip-fields will be removed during the token movements, the players are locked graphicAction
        Parameters:
        move - Move, that the token does

      • highlightFields

        public void highlightFields(java.util.List<Field> fields,
                            Move move)
        has all visited fields and the possible fields to be moved into.
        Parameters:
        fields - possible fields.
        move - Move (visited fields).
